activities: Cobite provides full life cycle mobile device and expense management services for corporately owned mobile devices to our customers globally. We receive employee information from our customers and their mobile phone usage records from the  wireless carriers.
contactoff1: Cobite Inc, 55 Broad St, 30th Fl, NY, NY 10004

personaldata: All customer employee personal data gathered and collected whether automatically or manually  is covered under Cobite's Privacy Policy
